original_title: Grade Five 2022 exam results will be release after considering appeals
original_body_lines: The Examinations Department announced today that the 2022 Grade Five scholarship examination results will be released after considering the appeals received.
It said the results will be published on the Examinations Department's official websites, www.doenets.lk and www.results.exams.gov.lk.
The department requests candidates to enter their correct examination numbers to obtain the results. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
